entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast early this evening. Wind becoming west 40 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 13 except minus 16 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear near midnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 13 except minus 16 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023
